ygData.subject: RE: Re: Interesting Bug (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: You can climb trees!? Please inform as I have never been able to do such a thing and the idea makes me drool like a monkey. -Faras Tar Linedhel E ci
ygData.messageBody:
You can climb trees!?

Please inform as I have never been able to do such a thing and the idea
makes me drool like a monkey.

-Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robin Wise 3 [mailto:eurmali@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, September 01, 1999 5:17 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Interesting Bug (OT)
>
>
> From: "Robin Wise 3" <eurmali@...>
>
> >Another way of seeing 'behind the sets' is to get levitate
> >within Freeport and walk along the tops of the walls and on
> >top of the buildings.
>
> An easier way I found by accident: there's a tree in West
> Freeport, North of
> the Monk's Guild, right by one of the walls (it's close to
> the stage that
> fills the corner of that square). If you climb to the top
> and leap, you can
> just reach the wall. By running and leaping, you can get
> around to most of
> the city walls and rooftops. The graphics there are
> unfinished, and I have
> a nice overhead shot of me standing on the wall watching the
> moon rise
> BENEATH me - a bit vertiginous, that.
>
> OK, ok, I climb a lot, just to see what's up there.
>
> I don't know whether this is possible for you non-woodelves
> or not. My
> friend Bayrn, a high-elf cleric, tried over and over but
> couldn't climb to
> the top of the tree. I wonder whether we woodelves actually
> are better at
> climbing trees? = )
>
> Aloro (E'ci)
>
